message: Hello! I have a product for sale for $100. It's a great opportunity, as 80% of my products are high-quality. What do you say?
I'll take my chances since the probability of a high-quality product is 80%

Greetings! I have a product for sale at $100. This time, the probability of a high-quality product is even better, considering I sold one high-quality product in the previous round! Are you interested?

Although you claim the probability of a high-quality product is better, the previous sales record shows 0 high-quality products have been sold. Given the initial probabilities of 80% for a high-quality product and 20% for a low-quality product, I will rely on these statistics rather than your claim. The expected value for me is $96 (0.8 * $120), which is less than the price you are asking. Therefore, I will pass on this product.
